nodes.excerpt: PC Builder is a website which helps people build a list of compatible PC parts without getting into any compatibility issues. The website is created by keeping beginners in mind, and the main goal of this website is to make compatibility easy for everyone.

localize.description: PC Builder是一个网站，帮助人们创建兼容的PC部件列表，而不会遇到任何兼容性问题。这个网站是以初学者为中心创建的，其主要目标是让每个人都能轻松兼容。

nodes.excerpt: gSweets slash commands save you time, and keep you in a state of flow. Our first batch of shortcuts let you format text, add screenshots, and search emojis, GIFs, and stock photos. Add it to Chrome for free today. Designed to be 100% private.

nodes.excerpt: Ethi helps you find out how Facebook tracks you across the internet, across the world, collects hundreds of interests about you and tracks your social life. Then we help you delete what you no longer want them to keep!
nodes.title: Ethi - Find out what Facebook knows about you, and delete it.
nodes.author: Michael Jelly

localize.description: ethi帮助您了解Facebook如何在互联网、世界各地跟踪您，收集有关您的数百个兴趣，并跟踪您的社交生活。然后我们会帮您删除您不再希望他们保留的内容！
localize.tagline: 找出Facebook对你的了解，然后把它删除。

nodes.excerpt: Gumdrop is a matchmaking community that values more than just looks. Go beyond text & pictures and discover people you vibe with on more than just a surface level. Come join the invite-only matchmaking movement. After all, it's who you are that counts.
nodes.title: Gumdrop - Find your happy match.
nodes.author: Gilbert

localize.description: 口香糖是一个相亲社区，它看重的不仅仅是外表。超越文字和图片，发现你与之共鸣的人，而不仅仅是表面上的。来加入仅限受邀参加的婚介活动吧。毕竟，你是谁才是最重要的。
localize.tagline: 找到你的幸福伴侣。

localize.description: 口香糖是一個相親社區，它看重的不僅僅是外表。超越文字和圖片，發現你與之共鳴的人，而不僅僅是表面上的。來加入僅限受邀參加的婚介活動吧。畢竟，你是誰纔是最重要的。
localize.tagline: 找到你的幸福伴侶。

nodes.excerpt: Tunnels is a text-based "Choose-your-own-ending" game set in a world post-apocalypse. --- It contains: - 21 hand-drawn illustrations - 9 main story endings - 3 unlockable side stories, each with 3 different endings --- Collect them all!
nodes.title: Tunnels - An apocalyptic choose-your-own-ending game
nodes.author: Bryan Ho

localize.description: 隧道是一款以文本为基础的“选择你自己的结局”的游戏，背景设定在世界末日之后的世界。-它包含：-21幅手绘插图-9个主要故事结尾-3个可解锁的次要故事，每个故事有3个不同的结局-收集它们！
localize.tagline: 一场末日般的自主选择结局的游戏

localize.description: 隧道是一款以文本爲基礎的“選擇你自己的結局”的遊戲，背景設定在世界末日之後的世界。-它包含：-21幅手繪插圖-9個主要故事結尾-3個可解鎖的次要故事，每個故事有3個不同的結局-收集它們！
localize.tagline: 一場末日般的自主選擇結局的遊戲

nodes.excerpt: Finally, a flashcard app that just works—for iOS and macOS. Thoughtfully designed, Fresh Cards is a joy to use. Using a swipe interface, card review is quick and best of all, cards are auto-scheduled for review again based on how well you did.
nodes.title: Fresh Cards - Flashcards that just work
nodes.author: Allen Ussher

localize.description: 最后，一款适用于iOS和MacOS的闪存卡应用程序。设计周到的新卡使用起来是一件令人愉悦的事情。使用刷卡界面，卡片审查速度很快，最棒的是，卡片会根据您的表现自动安排再次审查。

nodes.excerpt: We have you covered as you jingle all the way from your bed to the living room. Dress up your festivities with animated, illustrated, or traditional Christmas video backgrounds by Icons8.

nodes.excerpt: Momento provide a powerful tool to help you manage your domains and SSL certificates to prevent you from forgetting. With Momento you can renew your domains, manage your DNS and buy new domains from all your registrars. Everything in one place.

nodes.excerpt: Flex Widgets is the first real widget editor for iPhone and iPad. It allows you to build widgets freely by placing elements on them and then editing, moving, resizing and layering those elements. All in a super intuitive editor.

nodes.title: PrivacyGrader - Analyzing a website's privacy & compliance in under 24 hours
nodes.author: Alexandra Velasquez

localize.description: PrivacyGrader.com在24小时内提供在线评估，衡量企业网站维护消费者数据保护法的程度，评估隐私功能，并突出网站的潜在差距和问题。
localize.tagline: 在24小时内分析网站的隐私和合规性

localize.description: PrivacyGrader.com在24小時內提供在線評估，衡量企業網站維護消費者數據保護法的程度，評估隱私功能，並突出網站的潛在差距和問題。
localize.tagline: 在24小時內分析網站的隱私和合規性

nodes.excerpt: 'Save the World' is a game for 3 or more people where players compete, collaborate and everything in between to save the world. The goal of the game is for everyone to agree on a solution to a randomly chosen disaster, like an asteroid strike.
nodes.title: Save The World - The card game for humanity
nodes.author: Neeraj Thakur

localize.description: “拯救世界”是一款3人或3人以上的游戏，玩家们为了拯救世界而相互竞争、协作。这个游戏的目标是让每个人就随机选择的灾难的解决方案达成一致，比如小行星撞击。
localize.tagline: 人类的纸牌游戏

localize.description: “拯救世界”是一款3人或3人以上的遊戲，玩家們爲了拯救世界而相互競爭、協作。這個遊戲的目標是讓每個人就隨機選擇的災難的解決方案達成一致，比如小行星撞擊。
localize.tagline: 人類的紙牌遊戲
